Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body and rim of a light-brown pottery bowl with convex sides and everted ledge-rim, the interior is painted red and the rim black with remains of two white circles, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of one line of incised Coptic text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394245) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394245)
